title: Mid Season Reward?
body: When I logged in today, i got a message saying that I received a reward. I don't know what the reward could be and it seem like its not a icon. Is it because i play support only, I saw a post about riot rewarding support who "mastered" their lane?

replies.body: I think I may know what happened. I going to guess that you may have just now updated to the new client? If this is your first time using it, you may have gotten a notification about receiving a gift/reward, but that notification is probably in reference to something you got awhile back. It's kind of weird, but using the new client for the first time has a chance of alerting you to gifts/icons you got in the past.
Well I'm using the new client since it first came out but it's true about the fact that I did an update just before logging in
